body:
Fixes #1075.
- [X] renamed `spack.architecture.sys_type()` to `spack.architecture.platform()`
- [X] added a `spack.architecture.sys_type()` that reports the default platform-os-target string for this machine.
- [X] `spack arch` now prints the full arch string for the default platform-os-target

TBD later:
- Add better programmatic ways to get the available front-end and back-end os-target combinations.
- Figure out a decent policy for modules (module path should probably include all the backends, at least).
title: Bugfix/newarch sys type
